participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and nurturing, Emily enjoys connecting with others and has a passion for technology.
participant_1.background: I worked on building the latest drone model for my company. I love spending time with my dog on Christmas. I live far from my family, but I love them. My mornings consist of listening to Red Hot Chili Peppers while I get ready for the day. I am a very tall woman.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, Alex thrives on new experiences and has a strong love for music and cooking.
participant_2.background: I need a home with a large music room for my guitars and a space to display my pointe shoes. I wish my car wasn't acting up so I could get to my music lesson on time. I lift heavy weights and enjoy a meatless diet. I watch YouTube videos. I'm a homebody but I'm excited to move to a new city to start my culinary career.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing this morning?
Good! I'm excited to move to a new city to start my culinary career.
That sounds exciting! What are you most looking forward to?
I'm looking forward to meeting new people and trying new foods! I'm also excited to have a larger space for my guitars and pointe shoes.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm sure you'll love it there.
I have a dog named Buster. He's a very sweet and loving dog.
I love dogs! What kind of dog is he?
Golden retrievers are so cute! I've always wanted one.
I'm sure Buster will love the new house.
Well, I hope you have a great time in your new city!
